Hi,
	I've been spouting this idea that a modular evolving system (NEAT or 
otherwise) would have to define (and eventually evolve) the interfaces 
between the modules for quite a while now, and I'm curious to know whether 
people have any opinions on the approach, e.g. good, bad, indifferent, or 
you just don't get it?

	Ian
